title: IThreadFeatureData.MaintainThreadLength
description: Gets or sets whether to keep the thread a constant length from the starting surface in this thread feature.
returns: True to maintain a constant thread length, false to not (default)
remarks:
This property is valid only if:
IThreadFeatureData::Offset
is set to true.
IThreadFeatureData::EndCondition
is set to
swThreadEndCondition_e
:
swThreadEndCondition_Blind
- or -
swThreadEndCondition_Revolutions
